item.title: Flood alert: Wye Estuary in Gloucestershire
item.description: A flood alert has been issued as a series of high spring tides are expected over the next 3 days. Commencing with the high tide on Saturday morning, flooding may affect low lying land and roads adjacent the Wye Estuary from Redbrook to Chepstow. Predicted peaks. Newport 6.6 to 6.8m at 18:30 on 28/03/2025 and 7.0 to 7.2m at 07:00 on 29/03/2025. Avonmouth Portbury 6.9 to 7.1m at 18:45 on 28/03/2025 and 7.4 to 7.6m at 07:15 on 29/03/2025. We are closely monitoring the situation. Please avoid using low lying footpaths and plan driving routes to avoid low lying roads that may be flooded. This message will be updated by 17:00 on 29/03/2025, or as the situation changes.
